sect1.title: $template_dir
sect1.para: This is the name of the default template directory. If you do not supply a resource type when including files, they will be found here. By default this is ./templates, meaning that Smarty will look for the templates/ directory in the same directory as the executing php script.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: It is not recommended to put this directory under the web server document root.
